Name: Hauz Khas Social
Location: D-88, 2nd Floor, 31st December Marg, Block D, Hauz Khas, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India
Ambiance: Vibrant and contemporary with industrial-style decor, exposed brick walls, wooden furniture, and unique artwork. Rooftop seating with a view of Hauz Khas Lake.
Menu: Wide range of food and beverages, including burgers, sandwiches, pasta, cocktails, mocktails, and more. Creative presentation of dishes.
Events and Activities: Frequent events, live music performances, and social gatherings. Popular nightlife spot.
Operating Hours: Typically open in the afternoon and late at night. Check their official website or contact them for exact hours.
